body:
Hi,
How would it be possible to compile [MaSuRCA](ftp://ftp.genome.umd.edu/pub/MaSuRCA/MaSuRCA-3.2.1_09012016.tar.gz) with spack, because it does not uses `configure`,`make` and `make install` instead it uses `./install.sh`?

Thank you in advance.

Mic
title: installing software which does not use configure and make
